68Ballad

6/8 Ballad (036). This is in 6 and really doesn't work that well. I find it bit too choppy, but the original on the Casio is too. Converted from Casio Wk-3000.

  • 68Ballad
  • 68BalladIntro
  • 68BalladEnd
